messages.title: YOUR CHOICE AT THIS ELECTION:
messages.content: STRONG, STABLE LEADERSHIP IN THE NATIONAL INTEREST OR A COALITION OF CHAOS WITH JEREMY CORBYN

messages.title: Re-elect Theresa May and Oliver Heald in North East Hertfordshire
messages.content: Oliver Heald voted by 71% as one of Britain's hardest working MPs by fellow MPs. Oliver's strong voice in Parliament has delivered for North East Hertfordshire.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Oliver's plan will deliver a strong economy and ensure that North East Hertfordshire has its fair share of investment and support.

mentions.candidate: Oliver Heald voted by 71% as one of Britain's hardest working MPs by fellow MPs.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Think Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister is never going to happen? DONâ€™T BE SO SURE. SHOCK WIN: STUNNING TRUMP.

issues.economy: Oliver's plan will deliver a strong economy.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will continue to work tirelessly for all constituents...
